Title: Web Beats Rock
Description:
So, Foreman Alvegar sent you? That explains it.

The situation is not great. This place is crawling with nerubians and they're showing us no mercy. They forced us to mine and took our hard-earned opals. 

When you disobey, they web you up. 

I was barely able to escape them when they came. The others... Well, that's where you come in.

With you here distracting them, I can go rally the webbed earthen.
ObjectivesText: Rescue 6 earthen workers in the Opalcreg.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Cenderragg near the entrance of the mine
